title: Acceptance of gratuities
context: ยง122A-14 Acceptance of gratuities. No member of the Hawaii state defense force, by reason of membership therein, shall solicit or accept any compensation, gift, donation, gratuity, or thing of value from any source whatever except the pay and allowances provided under this chapter. Any person who violates this section shall be punished as may be directed by nonjudicial punishment or a court-martial. [L 1987, c 35, pt of ยง1; am L 1988, c 135, ยง1]
